revision.text:
A '''special''' is a [[magic number]] that identifies a special effect attached to an object. *[[Action special]] for an [[actor]] or [[linedef]]. :In case of actors, by default specials are activated by killing an actor. With {{flag|USESPECIAL}} it'll be activating by pressing "Use" next to the actor, and with {{flag|BUMPSPECIAL}} it'll be activated by bumping into it. See [[Activation]] for more details. *[[Sector special]] for a [[sector]].
{{disambig}}[[Category:Glossary]]
